qmmm.help: Executes qmmm calculations for individual molecules and clusters

print_regions_pdb.help: print the geometry of the regions to a pdb file

max_iterations.help: max iterations for qmmm scf loop

job_file.help: name of jobfile to which jobs are written

states.help: states to write jobs for and which to parse from jobfile

segments.help: segments to write jobs for and which to parse from jobfile

regions.help: Definitions of all regions inside qmmmm

polarregion.help: polar region with polarisation dipoles and thole damping

id.help: id of the region, first region has to have id 0, ids must be consecutive

segments.help: List of segments to include in the region separated by a whitespace. Each segment is defined by an index and a qmstate or a filename for the coordinates. e.g 1:s3 or 0:ORFILES/methane.xyz

cutoff.help: specifies the cutoff around either an another region or explicit segments in this region

region.help: Id of the region the cutoff should refer to, can be the same as this region's id, if segments are specified
